data.title: Scientists find big 1500-yr-old Viking settlement under new airport site - Midden, or garbage, materials of this age have never been found before in Norway. What's emerging is a rare look at a culture that's long gone, along with the lost coastline that once nourished it.
Report: All Major Oil Companies Knew of Climate Change by 1970s
Paris attacks: Belgian police arrest ninth suspect
Saudi Arabia is killing the Russian economy in its fight to control oil prices
Shin Bet: Jewish extremists seek to overthrow Israel's gov't and crown a king

“I am grieving for my past life – it’s like losing someone; I have lost myself,”: Australian Police paralyze man and accuse him of being on drugs after they wake him during surprise raid and then taze/break his spine. He had no prior criminal past, and had been sleeping on his friend's couch.
Pakistan changes neutral position on Syrian Civil War; now against any attempt to remove Assaad
Saudis to return 3 Indian workers who filmed their employer's brutal treatment
Somalia bans Christmas, New Year celebrations
Norway Officials to New Muslim Male Refugees: FYI, Rape is Wrong In Our Country
Facebook page linked to Taliban and Al Qaeda was registered to same address as British Muslim father whose Disneyland trip was blocked by Homeland Security
Russia Asks Erdogan to Keep Promise of Resignation
The governor of the Central Bank of Trinidad and Tobago has been fired after releasing the names of companies that have bought one-third of the foreign exchange sold in the last three years
50,000 Yemeni Forces Preparing to Attack Saudi Arabia, a Military Source Says
Three Indian Workers Beaten up by Saudi Employer
